item.description:
Who is Pitch and what we do

,,

We at Pitch are working on cool new tech that will take the way you experience music to the next level…

,

Check back with us some time!

item.title: What music does for you
item.description:
What music does for you

,,

Music makes your brain release endorphins, opioid-like substances that give you a “high”, except it’s natural, legal and healthy

,

… and oxytocin, the “bonding hormone”, the same one new mothers get when their babies are born

,

Music also makes your brain release less cortisol than it regularly does. Cortisol, the stress hormone, is harmful to your health, so having less of it is a good thing.

,

Music has been shown to improve lung function, general health, and life expectancy.

item.title: It can be done: UK CO2 emissions are down to 1800’s level
item.description:
It can be done: UK CO2 emissions are down to 1800’s level

,

UK's CO 2 emissions lowest since 19th century as coal use falls

The UK's carbon dioxide emissions have fallen to their lowest level since the 19th century as coal use continues to plummet, analysis suggests. Emissions of the major greenhouse gas fell almost 6 per cent year-on-year in 2016, after the use of coal for electricity more than halved to record lows, according to the Carbon Brief website, which reports on climate science and energy policy.

,

We aren’t going to make it to Mars, let’s keep our Earth habitable

,

#beinconvenient

,
